item.title: TIMU Bluetooth Lautsprecher mit Licht Bluetooth 5.4 Musikbox 30W Dual Lautsprecher Dualen Bass-Treibern 30 Std Akku IPX7 wasserdicht TWS Paarung AUX TF Karte Geeignet Outdoor/Party/Reisen
item.description:
Sie kÃ¶nnen TIMU Bluetooth Lautsprecher mit Licht Bluetooth 5.4 Musikbox 30W Dual Lautsprecher Dualen Bass-Treibern 30 Std Akku IPX7 wasserdicht TWS Paarung AUX TF Karte Geeignet Outdoor/Party/Reisen hier:

â„¹ï¸:

  • ã€IP7 Dustproof and Waterproof, Durable Designã€‘The lautsprecher boxen has IP7 waterproof performance, which can effectively prevent rain erosion and can work normally in various harsh outdoor environments. It uses high-quality materials and workmanship, and has been strictly tested and verified to ensure that it can remain stable and durable in various usage scenarios. Whether it is camping, partying, or traveling, you can enjoy high-quality music at any time without worrying about the impact of weather on the device.
  • ã€Everything you Need, a Great Giftã€‘The package includes 1 portable Bluetooth Lautsprecher, 1 Type-C charging cable and a quick start guide. In addition to the basic music playback function, it also comes with a microphone to support voice calls and hands-free calls. Whether at a party or outdoors, playing music from other devices, the high-quality speakers can provide clear and realistic sound effects, so that every detail of the music can be perfectly presented. It is suitable for music lovers and technology enthusiasts, and is a perfect Christmas gift and birthday gift for men and women.
  • ã€High-fidelity 360Â° stereo, immersive sound experienceã€‘The high-fidelity 360Â° stereo design makes the sound of the bluetooth lautsprecher more three-dimensional and shocking. Whether you are right in front of the Bluetooth speaker or on the side, you can experience balanced and clear music surround sound, as if you are at a concert. Using the most advanced audio processing technology, the bluetooth musikbox can restore every detail of the music, allowing users to feel as if they are in the world of music, enjoy a more convenient music experience, and ensure strong bass at any volume.
  • ã€Latest Bluetooth 5.4, 30 Std of battery lifeã€‘The latest Bluetooth 5.4 provides an incredible Bluetooth wireless range of up to 50 feet. It ensures smooth transmission of audio signals and reduces stuttering and delays. Using advanced battery technology, the mini bluetooth lautsprecher mit licht is equipped with a 4000mAh large-capacity battery with a standby time of up to 1 year. The bluetooth lautsprecher can play for more than 30 Std on a single charge, and supports fast charging function, so you can enjoy long-lasting music companionship. Whether it is an outdoor outing, a long journey or a family reunion, it can accompany you to spend a good time.
  • ã€RGB Color Light Showã€‘The Bluetooth musikbox can play dynamic and colorful light shows in sync with the beat of the music, bringing a new experience to your party. While enjoying the music, the dim lights will bring you a real party atmosphere. These visually striking lighting effects will set the mood and make any party more memorable, bringing a pure and delicate sound quality experience. You can easily connect the Bluetooth speaker to your phone, tablet, computer and other devices for a perfect audio experience.
  • ã€30W Ultra-High Power and TWS Connectionã€‘The powerful lautsprecher output power is up to 30W, which ensures that the Bluetooth speaker has enough volume output. Two 60 MM drivers ensure the balance and fullness of the sound, whether it is deep bass, delicate midrange or thick treble, making the sound fuller and more balanced. You can easily pair two Bluetooth speakers to achieve true wireless stereo HIFI sound quality. No matter where you are in the room, you can feel the music from all directions, as if you are in a luxurious private theater.
